name: Just One Bounce
description:
Start playing Just One Bounce today! It's a revolutionary new skill based bouncing puzzel game thats never been seen before. Can you get all 3 stars on each map?

How To Play:

 - Press and hold to power up your shot

 - Release your touch to shoot in the direction of your touch

 - Bounce off walls to renew your shot power and change color
 - Holding the shot slows down time

 - Bounce your way through the map to reach the end

Features:

 - One touch control

 - Reset the level at any point

 - Free, no Ads!
 - 35 Levels of wonder!?

Twitter @SibSap
